ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] http parameter pollution and action URLs
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think so. The main take-away is not to process requests from untrusted sources with unverifiable data. I would use one-time URIs to deal with attacks

I don't think so. The main take-away is not to process requests from  
untr=
usted sources with unverifiable data. I would use one-time URIs to  
deal w=
ith attacks like this.

Subbu
